Naren Henry, based in Los Angeles, serves as the Creative Director for Shadow Magic Productions. Currently writing a feature film for MGM, he adds a unique blend of commercial intelligence and artistic vision to the team. His industry impact is highlighted by credits on projects such as "Avengers: Infinity War," "The Blacklist," and "Billions."
